plot: A child from a noble family loses his parents due to the plot of a scheming courtier. He grows up to become a Robin Hood-like thief, stealing from corrupt officials.
title: Uijeok Iljimae
plot_es: A child from a noble family loses his parents due to the plot of a scheming courtier. He grows up to become a Robin Hood-like thief, stealing from corrupt officials.
plot_en: A child from a noble family loses his parents due to the plot of a scheming courtier. He grows up to become a Robin Hood-like thief, stealing from corrupt officials.
